prompt: Your presentation software gives you a choice of six slide layouts, depending on the kind of information you want to put on your slide: Title, Title and Body, Title and Two Columns, Title Only, Caption, and Blank. When would you choose a blank slide?
feedback: The choices of slide layouts in this presentation software give you different ways to organize your text. The blank slide would be useful when you want to add something that doesn’t fit in the other layout. If you have custom elements, like photos or charts, and you want to customize the layout, the blank slide would be a good choice.
